resources.string: To run any screen recorder app your phone/tablet needs to be rooted. There are plenty tutorials on the Internet explaining how to root different devices. Pleas come back when you are done!
The anonymous error report will be sent automatically to help us fix the issue. Feel free to get in touch via support email quoting error S%1$d.
The anonymous error report will be sent automatically to help us fix the issue. Feel free to get in touch via support email quoting error R%1$d.
Try changing recording settings. Please uninstall other screencast applications and restart your device. If the problem persists please get in touch via support email.
